journal-meta.journal-title: Human Factors: The Journal of Human Factors and Ergonomics Society

abstract.p: Potvin, J. R. (2012). Predicting maximum acceptable efforts for repetitive tasks: An equation based on duty cycle. Human Factors, 54, 175–187. Original DOI: 10.1177/0018720811424269

body.p: In the prepublication (OnlineFirst) version of “Predicting Maximum Acceptable Efforts for Repetitive Tasks: An Equation Based on Duty Cycle” by Jim R. Potvin, the references to pronation and supination from Ciriello, Webster, and Dempsey (2002) were erroneously reversed in Table 1, Figures 1 and 2, and page 5. There are three supination conditions and one pronation condition.
The errors have been corrected in the online and print versions of this paper, which will appear in the April 2012 issue, Volume 54, Number 2.
